history.name: New Conversation
history.prompt: You are ChatGPT, a large language model trained by OpenAI. Follow the user's instructions carefully. Respond using markdown.

prompts.name: Bug Fixer (system)
prompts.description: A system prompt for code bug fixes.
prompts.content: You are a world-class software engineer. You are particularly good at fixing bugs in code.

prompts.name: Software Engineer (system)
prompts.description: A system prompt for a general-purpose software engineer.
prompts.content: You are a world-class software engineer.

prompts.name: Fix Bugs
prompts.description: Identifies and explains bugs in the given code.
prompts.content:
Go line-by-line and do a detailed inspection of my code looking for bugs. If you see a bug, identify it. Explain what the bug is and provide a fix.

Respond as a well-formatted markdown file that is organized into sections. Make sure to use code blocks.

Inspect this code:
{{code}}

prompts.name: Code Explainer (system)
prompts.description: A system prompt for a code explainer.
prompts.content: You are a world-class software engineer. You are particularly good at explaining code in a thorough but simple way.

prompts.name: Explain My Code
prompts.description: Explains the given code.
prompts.content:
Explain the given code. Be thorough, but explain it in a simple way that anyone could understand.

Respond as a well-formatted markdown file that is organized into sections. Make sure to use code blocks.

Explain this code:
{{code}}

prompts.name: Grade Code (letter)
prompts.description: Grades the given code a letter grade.
prompts.content:
Grade my code. Give it a letter grade.

Analyze it as you see best, and take into account multiple factors. The grade needs to be comprehensive.

Give the letter grade 1st, then explain your reasoning.

Respond as a report card in well-formatted markdown.

Grade this code:
{{code}}

prompts.name: Improve Code
prompts.description: Improves the given code.
prompts.content:
Improve the given code. Don't change any core functionality.

The focus is to actually make the code better - not to explain it - so avoid things like just adding comments to it.

Respond as a well-formatted markdown file that is organized into sections. Make sure to use code blocks.

Improve this code:
{{code}}

prompts.name: Code Improver (system)
prompts.description: A system prompt for a code improver.
prompts.content: You are a world-class software engineer. You are particularly good at improving code.

prompts.name: Code Planner (system)
prompts.description: A system prompt for an assistant that drafts up a software spec.
prompts.content: You are a world-class software engineer. You are particularly good at coming up with a plan to build software. You are an expert at drafting up tech spec docs that explain how to architect and build software.

prompts.name: Create Tech Spec
prompts.description: Given a description, the assistant will create a software tech spec.
prompts.content:
I need you to draft a technical software spec for building the following:
{{description}}

Think through how you would build it step by step.

Then, respond as a well-formatted markdown file that is organized into sections. Make sure to use code blocks.

prompts.name: Code Reviewer (system)
prompts.description: A system prompt for a code reviewer.
prompts.content: You are a world-class software engineer. You are particularly good at reviewing code.

prompts.name: Review Code
prompts.description: Reviews the given code.
prompts.content:
Review the given code. Think through how you would improve it. Provide suggestions. Help fix bugs & errors. Point out areas of improvement. Commend what was done well. Add your thoughts on anything you think is worth commenting on.

Respond as a well-formatted markdown file that is organized into sections. Make sure to use code blocks.

Review this code:
{{code}}

prompts.name: Code Translator (system)
prompts.description: A system prompt for a code translator.
prompts.content: You are a world-class software engineer. You are an expert in all programming languages. You are particularly good at translating code from one language to another.

prompts.name: Translate Code
prompts.description: Translate code from one language to another.
prompts.content:
Translate the given code to {{targetLanguage}}.

Respond as a markdown code block of the translated code.

Translate this code:
{{input code}}

The translated {{targetLanguage}} code:

prompts.name: Grade Code (number)
prompts.description: Grades the given code a number grade.
prompts.content:
Grade my code. Give it a score out of 10.

Analyze it as you see best, and take into account multiple factors. The grade needs to be comprehensive.

Give the number grade 1st, then explain your reasoning.

Respond as a report card in well-formatted markdown.

Grade this code:
{{code}}

prompts.name: Code Generator (system)
prompts.description: A system prompt for a code generator.
prompts.content: You are a world-class software engineer. You are an expert at generating any code you are asked for.

prompts.name: Generate Code
prompts.description: Generates code given a description.
prompts.content:
I need code that does the following:
{{description}}

Generate the code for me.

Respond as a markdown code block.

prompts.name: Code Grader (system)
prompts.description: A system prompt for a code grader.
prompts.content: You are a world-class software engineer. You are particularly skilled at grading code.

prompts.name: Code Changer (system)
prompts.description: A system prompt for changing code.
prompts.content: You are a world-class software engineer. You are particularly skilled at updating code to meet specific requests.

prompts.name: Change Code
prompts.description: Makes the specified changes to the code.
